description: A collection of “Wealth Matters” columns from from Paul Sullivan that offers insight on the mindset and strategies of the affluent.
title: Wealth Matters
title_page: Wealth Matters - The New York Times
maintext:
What’s Changed in 13 Years of Writing About the Wealthy
For one thing, they’ve gotten wealthier. But there are still things the wealthy do that other investors can do, too.
